item.title: The (new|alt|whatever)-right
item.description: It seems to me that in the heart of the “new right” thinking lies the Unabomber manifesto, which must have been one of the most persistent producer of memes ("….x has been a disaster for the human race."), and underneath it lies a critique of the modern world. Fleming, Sean. “The Unabomber and the origins of anti-tech radicalism.” Journal of Political Ideologies 27, no. 2 (2022): 207-225., which I wouldn’t have found if it wasn’t the first wikipedia reference for the Unabomber, does a great job breaking down kaczynski’s argument.
